title: Sportify Kids
homepageDescription: Welcome to Sportify Kids - Making your kids more athletic
carouselDescription1: Welcome to SportifyKids to make your kids more athletic
carouselDescription2: Running is one of the most important sports for your child
carouselDescription3: Swimming is a fun sport for children of all ages.
carouselDescription4: Healthy food for your child is important during training and for physical fitness.
sportsSectionTitle: Examples of Sports Kids Should Practice
swimmingDescription: A fun, full-body exercise for all ages.
healthyFoodSectionTitle: Healthy Foods Your Child Should Eat During Exercise
fruitsDescription: Fruits like apples and bananas are rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
saladDescription: A mix of greens and vegetables, great for a healthy meal.
milkDescription: Rich in calcium and essential nutrients.
eggsDescription: High in protein, ideal for muscle growth.
tip1Description: Kids mimic parents, so be active too.
tip2Description: Promote activities that get them moving.
tip3Description: Balance screen time with physical activity.
tip4Description: Group sports teach teamwork and discipline.
